Module CommonData
Package blocks

Class OctTreeBlocks

java.lang.Object
blocks.Blocks
blocks.OctTreeBlocks
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<XYZBlock>
public class OctTreeBlocks extends Blocks
An implementation of Blocks that uses an Oct tree. Which is an algorithm used to reduce memory consumption of storing voxels (blocks).
Because of memory limitations, this class only supports up to 256 (byte max value) different types of blocks.

    • getGroundLayerIncomplete

      public XYZBlock[][] getGroundLayerIncomplete()
      Description copied from class: Blocks
      Finds the highest ground block Classification.GROUND in each (x,y) column. However, the 2d array may contain null values if the column does not have any ground blocks. Use Blocks.getGroundLayer() to get a GroundLayer object that is guaranteed to have a ground block in every column.
      Overrides:
      getGroundLayerIncomplete in class Blocks
      Returns:
      The x,y array that contains the XYZBlock representing the highest ground block

    • numberOfBlocksWithClassificationInRadius

      public int numberOfBlocksWithClassificationInRadius(int x, int y, int z, Classification classification, int radius)
      Description copied from class: Blocks
      Returns the number of blocks that have the given classification in a radius. For example, a radius of three checks all blocks in a 7*7*7 cube with the specified coordinate as the middle.

      Parameters:
